Name: Susurye of Shadows
About the game: After waking up in an unknown place, with no past memories, he was forced to explore the place where he is. As you explore, you'll encounter various puzzles and challenges along the way. Between traps and discoveries, he hopes to recover past memories. However, the deeper he goes, the more confused he feels. With past traumas, he has an unknown feeling, which makes him want to get out of there.
